actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

official_title: To redesignate the Longfellow National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
short_title: Longfellow House-Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site Designation Act

summary.text: Longfellow House-Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site Designation Act - Redesignates the Longfellow National Historic Site in Cambridge, Massachusetts, as the Longfellow House-Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site.

titles.title: Longfellow House-Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site Designation Act
To redesignate the Longfellow National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
